title: 120+ Kindle Books by Indian Authors (gnv64)
description:
This torrent contains a collection of 120+ Kindle books by major/famous Indian Authors. Most books are in MOBI format. Some are in PDF format as I could not get them in MOBI format. Also included are books on India by non-Indian authors. Books are both in fiction & non-fiction genre. Almost all books are checked on Kindle Paperwhite. I am not giving the full list here but some of the well-known ones are:

MOBIs
01. Sea of Poppies - Amitav Ghosh
02. Calcutta Chromosome - Amitav Ghosh
03. The Shiva Trilogy - Amish Tripathi
04. Scion of Ikshvaku - Amish Tripathi
